name: PDFAnnotationText
desc: A PDFAnnotationText object displays as an icon (such as a “sticky note”) attached to a specified point in the PDF document.DeprecatedUse PDFAnnotationSubtype instead.

items.name: func iconType() -> PDFTextAnnotationIconType
items.desc: Returns the icon type for the annotation.

items.name: func setIconType(PDFTextAnnotationIconType)
items.desc: Sets the icon type for the annotation.

items.name: enum PDFTextAnnotationIconType
items.desc: The types of icons that a text annotation can use.
